name: Salomon Outblast TS Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
description: Make happy winter memories in durable, comfortable boots. Constructed for a precise, foot-hugging fit, the synthetic upper has sleek modern look. Welded overlays, waterproof materials and gusseted tongue keep muck and wetness out. A cushy footbed and foam midsole on top of a stand-out, winter-ready soles keep you upright in all conditions.Tough synthetic uppers have welded overlays for durability.ClimaSalomon Waterproof (CSWP) bootie tackles wet conditions.Thin, warm, 200gram Thinsulate™ Insulation provides warmth for winter days.Sensifit™ construction provides a precise, secure fit.Gusseted tongue keeps debris out.Removable OrthoLite® EVA footbeds cushion feet for long days on the trail.Injected EVA midsoles combine cushioning and support.Outsoles are hard-wearing Contagrip® MD.Lugs provide traction on hard or smooth, loose surfaces.
